some people say that now we can see films on our phones or tablets there is no need to go the cinema. Others say that to be fully enjoyed, films need to be seen in a cinema. 
Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
text: I am writing this letter to complain about the garbage collection system functionality in our community area.

I have been living in the Scarborough area for three years and previously, I had a keen observation on how the waste management system working on. It's quite quintessential on those days, but now-a-days the collection vehicle's are not coming at regular intervals of time. As a result, all domestic garbage mushrooming in the dedicated area for the waste products.

In addition to that, since the premises of waste are quite near to residential area, the smell coming from the wastage is unbearable. This problem has been reported several times by our neighbour's as well. Last month, one of the school kids got a severe infection with the inhaling of bad smell.

In order to avoid such circumstances in our community,  I strongly recommend you to provide sufficient vehicle's and required resources to collect the garbage. So that, our community will health hazards free society.
Looking forward your kind support to resolve and anticipating the proper resolution as soon as possible.
